replies.body: Were you talking about in the store to buy skins or where you can see all the skins you own? There isn't a tab in your collection where you can see every single skin you currently own. But, if you go into the shop and click on skins, then click on "show owned", that will show you a good deal of the skins you own.

I was asked by a Rioter to create a thread so I can solve my issues with not being able to comment or upvote on boards.
{{summoner:31}}
